project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that asks the user multiple-choice questions, keeps track of the user's score, and displays it at the end of the game.

task.name: Define the questions and answers structure in the code
Implement the quiz game logic to ask questions and process user input
Keep track of the user's score throughout the game
Display the final score to the user at the end of the game
Write tests to validate the quiz game functionality (e.g., process user input, score calculation)
Execute tests to ensure the quiz game functions correctly
